Madison.John J. Suhr House:
The John J. Suhr House is a historic house located on Langdon Street, Madison, Wisconsin, United States.


== History ==
Built in 1886, the house was admitted to the National Register of Historic Places listings in Dane County, Wisconsin on June 17, 1982. The residence was built in the French Second Empire architectural style by the local prominent architect Captain John Nader, who also designed Holy Redeemer Catholic Church (1869), St.
